author: bsunanda
body:
Combined tag for NZS (phi symmetry), Dijet, GammaJet, IsoTrack, Muon calibration scheme. The "runTheMatrix.py -s --useInput all" yields "10 9 8 7 6 tests passed, 0 1 0 0 0 failed"
Automatically ported from CMSSW_7_4_X #7523
title: bsunanda:Run2-alca4 (Combined tag for phi symmetry, Dijet, GammaJet, IsoTrack, Muon calibration scheme)
